member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.Cryptography.Cryptographer
member.summary: Facade which exposes common cryptography uses.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.Cryptography.Cryptographer.CreateHash(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Computes the hash value of plain text.
member.param: The input for which to compute the hash.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.Cryptography.Cryptographer.CreateHash(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Computes the hash value of plain text.
member.param: The input for which to compute the hash represented as a base64 encoded string.
member.returns: The computed hash code as a base64 encoded string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.Cryptography.Cryptographer.CompareHash(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Compares plain text input with a computed hash.
member.remarks: Use this method to compare hash values. Since hashes may contain a random "salt" value, two seperately generated hashes of the same plain text may result in different values.
member.param: The input for which you want to compare the hash to.
The hash value for which you want to compare the input to.
member.returns: true if plainText hashed is equal to the hashedText. Otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.Cryptography.Cryptographer.CompareHash(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compares plain text input with a computed hash.
member.remarks: Use this method to compare hash values. Since hashes contain a random "salt" value, two seperately generated hashes of the same plain text will result in different values.
member.param: The input as a string for which you want to compare the hash to.
The hash as a string for which you want to compare the input to.
member.returns: true if plainText hashed is equal to the hashedText. Otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.Cryptography.Cryptographer.EncryptSymmetric(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypts a secret using a specified symmetric cryptography provider.
member.param: The input for which you want to encrypt.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.Cryptography.Cryptographer.EncryptSymmetric(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts a secret using a specified symmetric cryptography provider.
member.param: The input as a base64 encoded string for which you want to encrypt.
member.returns: The resulting cipher text as a base64 encoded string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.Cryptography.Cryptographer.DecryptSymmetric(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts a cipher text using a specified symmetric cryptography provider.
member.param: The cipher text for which you want to decrypt.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.Cryptography.Cryptographer.DecryptSymmetric(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts a cipher text using a specified symmetric cryptography provider.
member.param: The cipher text as a base64 encoded string for which you want to decrypt.
member.returns: The resulting plain text as a string.
